synopsis: Yotaro has self-described White Knight Syndrome. He hears Kidoin Makio's scream, and rushes to her rescue.

title.jp: Sono Kakugo ga Aru no ka

synopsis: Yotaro decides that he can't let Makio live in her huge mansion all by herself.
Makio was to be taken overseas by her father. Yotaro intervenes, but finds Alice injured.
Yotaro becomes the target of a revenge after he'd defeated Kongoji in a duel.

title.jp: Kyou dake wa Tokubetsu dakara ne!

synopsis: Yufeng joins the family, and they all go to the hot springs together. But there's always one person missing.

title.jp: Ore no Mono ni Nare yo

synopsis: Yuyan and Yotaro are abducted by the chair of the East Asia branch of the World Knights organization.
Mao and the others go against Yoriko's command to stay put, and sneak to the town where Yotaro was hidden in order to help find him.
Yotaro and the gang confront the Four Gods.
The battle between the Four Gods and Yotaro's family comes to an unexpected close.
Yotaro and the gang are once again abducted by a Knights of the World branch director.
